bibl.title: P. Oxy. 2737 and Aristophanes' Early Career.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XXXV, 2737, 44-51 (= C.G.F.P. 56; AR., fr. 590 K.-A). Aristophanes did not produce the Banqueters in his own name because he was not yet entitled to compete at the Dionysia.
bibl.seg: GILULA Dwora, P. Oxy. 2737 and Aristophanes' Early Career.
P. Oxy. XXXV, 2737, 44-51 (= C.G.F.P. 56; AR., fr. 590 K.-A). Aristophanes did not produce the Banqueters in his own name because he was not yet entitled to compete at the Dionysia.
